data.name: Modesto-Berkeley DevFest 2019
data.description: Hey GDGers, we know October is a long ways out, but we’re super excited to bring you the first DevFest to be hosted in Modesto (and our second partnering with GDG Berkeley)! Location is TBD, but the date will be October 19, 2019 so mark your calendars now and get ready for a day full of awesome tech…

data.name: General
data.description: Conferences covering a wide range of web development and software engineering topics.

relatedRecords.name: IT Pro Camp 2020
relatedRecords.description: Putting on an event of this size takes a lot of people. To keep the costs down, we need generous people like you to volunteer your time. Sign up using the button below, As a Reward, all voluteers will be able to take the certification testing on Friday evening before the event. Now how cool is that…

relatedRecords.description: Heartland Developer Conference (HDC), hosted in Omaha, NE, is the region’s longest running software design & development event. See the year’s schedule.
